body.name: ScharkSpark GPS Drone with Camera for Adults 4K, Drone with Brushless Motor, Auto Return, Circle Fly, Waypoint Fly, Follow me, 50+ Mins Long Flight for Beginner, Gifts for Adults/Kids with 2 Batteries
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 mins
Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 mins
features: Drones with Camera for Adults 4K: The 90° adjustable drone with 4K UHD camera can be manually adjusted up and down to capture amazing views and render them in Ultra HD pixels. You can also connect your phone to the drone via WiFi and the smooth 5GHz transmission allows you to enjoy FPV mode on the app.

GPS Intelligent Positioning: This GPS drone with camera for adults will automatically return to home when the battery is low or the signal is lost. Just press "one-key return" to execute the return function. No more worrying about the drone with camera flying away, just enjoy the air trip and bring the 4k drone home easily in a carrying case.

Powerful and Long-lasting: Built-in long-life brushless motors increase power while reducing energy consumption, allowing you to enjoy quieter, more powerful flights. The drone with camera for adults 4k also comes with 2 rechargeable batteries that provide a total of 50+ minutes of flight time. Fully charged before use, so that the drone can not be used properly due to low battery protection. Weighing less than 250 grams, it's FAA-registration free. Great for gift giving!

Multiple Functions: This drone with camera for adults can automatically track and follow you, fly along the path you set or circle around a point. This feature-rich drone can also take photos or videos when you pose “V” for the camera, allows you to enjoy every wonderful moment with your family or friends. In addition, the drones for adults/kids also have headless mode, one-key takeoff/landing, suitable for beginners and skilled players!

After-Sales Service: We recommend you to test the drone with camera for adults 4k in an open area during your first flight. (Note: It may be interfered by wind when used outdoors) If you encounter any problems while using drone, please feel free to contact us. We provide 24 hours technical support service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The drone delivers impressive performance with its stable flight controls and high-resolution camera, capturing stunning aerial footage and photos with ease. Its compact and portable design makes it convenient to carry for outdoor adventures and travel. With user-friendly features and intuitive controls, this drone is perfect for both beginners and experienced pilots looking to explore the skies and capture breathtaking moments from above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good drone for the price
reviews.reviewText: Once you get it calibrated, it is really good. The directions could be clearer and it takes some practice to calibrate, but it's easy to fly and has a lot of features. The camera is very good. The battery life is better than some similar drones. The GPS system works as described. One touch takeoff and landing bake it easy to operate. Definitely a lot of fun to fly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have been using it for 3 days. It is a trustworthy product.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using it for 3 days. It is a trustworthy product. It is very easy to operate and has good stability. It is my first time to use a drone and I have chosen the right brand. Small, lightweight and great value for money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't Calibrate or Take off
reviews.reviewText: I've tried repeatedly through both the app and the remote control to calibrate and work this drone, and nothing works. It beeps, but not how the manuals say it will, and then does nothing. I haven't seen a rotor spin yet, nor does it seem to calibrate even with a full signal. Very frustrating...what a waste of time and expectations.Additional note: Part of the problem was that I was using an iPhone to run the app. When I switched to some old Samsung Android phone, then the app worked much better and I was able to get it to take off. But note that originally the remote control didn't work either with the first iteration (I returned the whole thing and they sent another). In this second iteration now, I was able to calibrate with the Android app and then the remote control worked. But on the second takeoff and "landing" it crashed landed and one of the motors now won't work. Good thing I bought the warranty...if I even keep the device. I'm thinking of returning completely and washing my hands of it. Ridiculous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great beginner drone
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical coming from a dji mavick, but for what i use it for this drone is awesome! Having 2 batteries in the package gives it plenty of life. The camera quality is not bad at all. Controls make it really easy to fly, even for my nephew. The features on the app really make it easy to use, i did not expect to have similar features to dji in this cheap of a drone, but they work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Drone for Kids - Easy to Use and So Much Fun!
reviews.reviewText: This drone for kids is a fantastic choice! Setting it up was a breeze with clear instructions, and its intuitive controls made it easy for my kids to master. The drone's durable build handled their occasional bumps and crashes effortlessly. Safety features like altitude hold and headless mode provided added reassurance. The user-friendly app and impressive photo/video quality added an extra layer of fun to their flying adventures. Highly recommended for young drone enthusiasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works well if set up properly. Control has a screen with useful information
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The drone is easier to fly than a typical cheap drone. The price fits the performance. If the GPS is set up correctly, it will hold its general location with some vertical variation. It really depends a lot on initial setup for drones in general (after trying out a few). It's not as good as a more expensive holy stone hd700e for example but it had similar performance with the calibration and setup done (in terms of stability and ease of flying). Seems you always have to do some calibration with more advanced drones if the drone isn't taking off from the same spot. The return function worked well.It has been windy and I was surprised it actually held its position through some strong gusts. Seemed to be more steady during them in fact. If the headlights are blinking fast, there's no GPS and it won't hold its position so well. It worked better indoors than the holy stone that crashed immediately inside but that again might be calibration.There's a microSD card slot for recording directly with the drone. There are also maybe 5 cameras on the thing. 3 down, 2 forward. The forward cameras are electronically controlled. I'm still looking for a way to access them. Note there's actually plastic covering the larger camerasIt's a good drone. You have to read the instructions carefully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Difficult learning curve
reviews.reviewText: The remote is okay. It will take a lot of practice and broken wings to learn to fly.
